Posts.EditableText:
You know what I miss from Quest 3 that is not in Quest 4...

There was a spot in QDK when you were editing a room where you could dictate what items could be used in that room and add scripts.

It sure does suck that you can no longer do that.

Bring that back...seriously...do it.


Thanks,
Dr. Froth
